name: Virtual Life In A Simple City
name_original: Virtual Life In A Simple City
description:
Experience the real life challenges of Virtual life in a simple city. You will perform duty as Virtual family member and Perform multiple tasks as a responsible citizen for example help women to cross the road, call the ambulance on accident place, have coffee from coffee shop, go to office and much more.

Take your family for dinner and cinema for having movie fun. You can also visit your uncle home and ask him about his health. This Virtual life in simple city which is filled with Happiness and good deeds. Don't wait anymore join this virtual life fun to experience the real happy life.

Features
- Play as responsible hero in virtual family city
- Help citizen to spread peace in the city
- Take family to cinema for entertainment
- Go to office and perform office duties
- Amazing graphics and easy game controls
- Addictive gameplay and blocky city environment
